term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - diffuse layer in electrochemistry
term.title: diffuse layer

item.text: The region in which non-specifically adsorbed ions are accumulated and distributed by the contrasting action of the electric field and thermal motion. Counter and co-ions in immediate contact with the surface are said to be located in the Stern layer. Ions farther away from the surface form the diffuse layer or Gouy layer.
